#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cctype>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

#define S(t); scanf("%d",&t);
#define Sl(t); scanf("%lld",&t);
#define P(t); printf("%d\n",t);
#define Pl(t); printf("%lld\n",t);
#define REP(i,n) for(i=0; i<n; i++)
#define MAXN 1010
#define MOD 100000007



using namespace std;


typedef long long int llint;

int main()
{
    int i,j,t,n;
    char str[1000];
    
    S(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",str);
        int len = strlen(str);
        int s=0;
        
        for(i=0; str[i]; i++)
        {
            s=s+int(str[i]);
        }
        
        s /= len;
        printf("%c\n",s);
    }
    return 0;
}
